title: (x) Veritate corporate typeface - FF Scala Sans {Yves}

author: tristanbaker

comments.content:
Which one exactly.?

_The one used [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20051111042010/http:/www.superfamous.com/empire/docs/cases/0047.html) for ‘veritate/tripolis’ is_ ‘ [( Chalet ) Comprime](http://web.archive.org/web/20051111042010/http:/www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=11&subpage=viewfonts)’ _( ‘70 )_.. :)  
_( Edit-a-bit.: I think the other one, marked with the arrows, on your sample, is too small, for me, to recognize, but I am in the need of glasses anyway.. :)_

Thanks, man, but the one I need is the other one…

You can see it more clearly in the link

[http://www.superfamous.com/empire/docs/cases/0048.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20051111042010/http:/www.superfamous.com/empire/docs/cases/0048.html)

thx

Difficult to be certain but I think that is [Bliss](http://web.archive.org/web/20051111042010/http:/www.typography.net/type/bliss.htm)  
Tim
